item.title: Mercedes add a quote by René Descartes
item.description: "Cogito ergo sum. <i>(I think, therefore I am.)</i>" -- René Descartes

item.title: Mercedes add a quote by Ambrose Bierce
item.description: "All are lunatics, but he who can analyze his delusion is called a philosopher." -- Ambrose Bierce

item.title: Mercedes add a quote by Ambrose Bierce
item.description: "<b>Faith, n.</b> Belief without evidence in what is told by one who speaks without knowledge, of things without parallel." -- Ambrose Bierce

item.title: Mercedes add a quote by Gloria Steinem
item.description: "A feminist is anyone who recognizes the equality and full humanity of women and men." -- Gloria Steinem

item.title: Mercedes add a quote by Federico García Lorca
item.description:
"Verde que te quiero verde.
Verde viento. Verdes ramas.
El barco sobre la mar
y el caballo en la montaña." -- Federico García Lorca

item.title: Mercedes add a quote by Federico Garcia Lorca - "City Without Sleep"
Mercedes add a quote by Federico García-Lorca
item.description: "Only mystery allows us to live, only mystery." -- Federico García-Lorca

item.title: Mercedes add a quote by Luce Irigaray
item.description: "Sexual difference is probably the issue in our time which could be our 'salvation' if we thought it through." -- Luce Irigaray

item.title: Mercedes add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "Those who dream by day are cognizant of many things which escape those who dream only by night." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Mercedes add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "All that we see or seem is but a dream within a dream." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Mercedes add a quote by Sor Juana Inés de la Cruz
item.description: "The greater evil who is in- When both in wayward paths are straying? The poor sinner for the pain Or he who pays for the sin?" -- Sor Juana Inés de la Cruz
